text: Khumbulani okokuba Sathabatha uMnqophiso naBantwana bakwaSirayeli (wokuba): Ningakhonzi bani ngaphandle koAllâh. Yibani nenkathalo ngabazali benu nangezizalwana zenu nangeenkedama namahlwempu, nithethe kakuhle ebantwini, miselani, iSalâh, nihlawule umrhumo wamahlwempu, kodwa najibilika nina emva koko nabuya umva ngaphandle kwabambalwa kuni, kwaye nisajibilikile nangoku
